parameters:
Black Witch: It's interesting to see such amusing people
coming to a place like this. This is a narrow yet vast
special space... My own world.
Black Witch: Life here is boring. Will you keep me company?
Black Witch: Hehe, I got rejected.

Black Witch: Even if my appearance changes... don't run
away, okay?

Black Witch: I lost, ufufu. It's unexpectedly refreshing,
though.

Black Witch: It's better for your own sake not to ask. If
you talk carelessly, you might also be targeted by the hero.
実績 自らを封じた魔女
Black Witch: Hmm, did I expect too much?

Black Witch: Be careful of the hero. He will never be
forgiven for being an exception in this world.
